catagory_name: ประกันภัยการเดินทาง
policy_name: เดินทางคนเดียวหรือไปเป็นคู่ MSIG Travel Easy
policy_name_en: Travel alone or as a couple with MSIG Travel Easy
company: เอ็ม เอส ไอ จี ประกันภัย
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม 190 บาท/วัน
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 190 baht per day.
- Wherever you are in the world, you are protected against accidents and illnesses.
- Coverage for Covid-19 treatment is available both internationally and within Thailand, and you can make claims.
- There is a 24-hour global emergency assistance network.
- 100% refund if your visa is not approved.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยการเดินทาง
policy_name: เดินทางทั้งครอบครัวหรือเป็นกลุ่ม Travel Protect
policy_name_en: Travel with your family or as a group with Travel Protect
company: ธนชาตประกันภัย
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม 209 บาท/วัน
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 209 baht per day.
- Parents buy, and as a bonus, children travel for free, up to a maximum of 2 people, anywhere in the world.
- Additional coverage options are available for purchase.
- Coverage for medical expenses abroad, up to 5 million.
- Claims can be made without any upfront payment.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยรถมอเตอร์ไซค์
policy_name: ประกันภัยโจรกรรมรถมอเตอร์ไซค์
company: วิริยะประกันภัย
company_en: The Viriyah Insurance Public Company limited.
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละไม่ถึงบาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at less than one baht per day.
-It covers the loss of the entire vehicle due to theft, robbery, hijacking, or accidents.
-It provides coverage for death or permanent disability resulting from any type of accident. 
-You can reach the Call Center 24 hours a day to address any issues.
-You can purchase it at any branch of Ngern Tid Lor.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยรถมอเตอร์ไซค์
policy_name: ประกันภัยรถมอเตอร์ไซค์ภาคสมัครใจ (ประเภท 2+ และ 3)
company: ชับบ์สามัคคีประกันภัย
company_en: CHUBB SAMAGGI INSURANCE PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่มต้นวันละ 5 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 5 baht per day.
-It provides coverage for personal life and property.
-It provides coverage for the driver up to 200,000 baht per occurrence.
-You can reach the Call Center 24 hours a day to address any issues.
-You can purchase it at any branch of Ngern Tid Lor.

catagory_name: ประกันมะเร็ง
policy_name: ประกันมะเร็ง แผน A
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่มต้นวันละ 3 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 3 baht per day.
-General cancer coverage is up to 100,000 baht.
-The maximum coverage for special medical treatment is 400,000 baht.
-Upon the diagnosis of cancer, the initial lump sum payment will be provided immediately without the need for a health examination.
-It covers nearly one million baht for cancer treatment.
-It also covers travel expenses and the cost of repeated examinations for treatment.

catagory_name: ประกันมะเร็ง

-The maximum coverage for special medical treatment is 500,000 baht.
-Upon the diagnosis of cancer, the initial lump sum payment will be provided immediately without the need for a health examination.
-It covers nearly one million baht for cancer treatment.
-It also covers travel expenses and the cost of repeated examinations for treatment.

catagory_name: ประกันมะเร็ง

-Upon the diagnosis of cancer, the initial lump sum payment will be provided immediately without the need for a health examination.

catagory_name: ประกันอุบัติเหตุส่วนบุคคล
policy_name: ประกันอุบัติเหตุทวีคูณ
policy_name_en: Personal accident insurance with multiplier coverage
company: ชับบ์สามัคคีประกันภัย
company_en: CHUBB SAMAGGI INSURANCE PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละ 9 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 9 baht per day.
-The maximum daily income compensation is 3,000 baht.
-The maximum coverage for medical expenses is 70,000 baht per occurrence.
-There is a 24-hour emergency assistance service for both car breakdowns and medical emergencies.
-There is no need for out-of-pocket payment as it includes leading private hospitals within the network.
-There is high income compensation.
-The insurance coverage is twice the amount for public accidents.

catagory_name: ประกันอุบัติเหตุส่วนบุคคล
policy_name: ประกันอุบัติเหตุครอบครัวอุ่นใจ
company: ชับบ์สามัคคีประกันภัย
company_en: CHUBB SAMAGGI INSURANCE PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละ 8 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 8 baht per day.
-The coverage is for a maximum of two individuals, typically a parent and a child.
-The maximum daily income compensation covers the entire household and is up to 2,000 baht
-There is no need for out-of-pocket payment as it includes leading private hospitals within the network.
-There is high income compensation.
-The insurance coverage is twice the amount for public accidents.

catagory_name: ประกันอุบัติเหตุส่วนบุคคล
policy_name: ประกันอุบัติเหตุสุดคุ้ม
company: เอฟดับบลิวดี
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละ 1 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
--The premium starts at 1 baht per day.
-In the event of an unexpected incident, the maximum insurance coverage is 400,000 baht.
-It provides coverage for both riding and being a passenger on motorcycles.
-There is no need for out-of-pocket payment as it includes leading private hospitals within the network.
-There is high income compensation.
-The insurance coverage is twice the amount for public accidents.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยบ้านและคอนโด
policy_name: ประกันภัยคอนโด
company: เอ็ม เอส ไอ จี ประกันภัย
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละ 5 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 5 baht per day.
-The maximum coverage for water-related incidents in a condominium, such as burst pipes or water leakage, is up to 20,000 baht.
-Compensation for damages caused from our unit to other units is covered up to 500,000 baht.
-Damages to condominium windows are covered up to 50,000 baht.
-It provides comprehensive coverage for the entire house and its occupants.
-It covers incidents such as fire, flooding, and home invasion by burglars.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยบ้านและคอนโด
policy_name: ประกันภัยบ้าน
company: เอ็ม เอส ไอ จี ประกันภัย
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละ 8 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
-The premium starts at 8 baht per day.
-The maximum coverage for home invasion by burglars is 1,000,000 baht.
-Compensation for damages caused from our home to other homes is covered up to 1,000,000 baht.
-Coverage for damages due to house flooding is up to 100,000 baht.
-There is coverage for temporary living expenses and compensation in case of death of a family member due to accidents.
-It provides comprehensive coverage for the entire house and its occupants.
-It covers incidents such as fire, flooding, and home invasion by burglars.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยบ้านและคอนโด

company: เอ็ม เอส ไอ จี ประกันภัย
policy_premium: เบี้ยเริ่ม วันละ 3 บาท
policy_description_benefit:
--The premium starts at 3 baht per day.
-It provides comprehensive coverage for residents, the house, including windows attached to the building, and personal belongings within the house.
-Coverage for fire, lightning, and explosions is up to 5,000,000 baht per year.
-Compensation for damages caused from our home to other homes is covered up to 500,000 baht per year.
-Personal accident coverage is provided, with a maximum coverage limit of 100,000 baht per year.
-It provides comprehensive coverage for the entire house and its occupants.
-It covers incidents such as fire, flooding, and home invasion by burglars.

catagory_name: ประกันภัยบ้านและคอนโด
policy_name: ประกันภัยบ้านแบบประหยัด

-In the event of homelessness due to an incident, it provides accommodation expenses of 300 baht per day.
-The insurance can be purchased only at branches of 'Ngern Tid Lor'.
-It provides comprehensive coverage for the entire house and its occupants.
-It covers incidents such as fire, flooding, and home invasion by burglars.
